sync.dataSavedLocally: Data is saved only on this browser.

reconnectModal.title: Connection Required
reconnectModal.subtitle: Sync has been paused
reconnectModal.errorMessage: Your session has expired. Please reconnect to continue using the app.
reconnectModal.step1: Click "Reconnect Now" to authenticate with Google
reconnectModal.step2: Your data will be synced automatically
reconnectModal.dataSafe: Your local data is safe and will be synced once reconnected
reconnectModal.startFreshWarning: This will clear all local data and restart the app

landing.title: Family Finance Manager
landing.subtitle: Track expenses, manage budgets, and achieve your financial goals together

tracking.title: Smart Expense Tracking
tracking.description: Log and categorize all your family expenses in one place

budgets.title: Budget Management
budgets.description: Set budgets by category and track spending in real-time

goals.title: Savings Goals
goals.description: Define financial goals and monitor your progress

sync.title: Cloud Sync
sync.description: Sync data across devices using Google Sheets

insights.title: Visual Insights
insights.description: Beautiful charts and analytics to understand your spending

family.title: Family Collaboration
family.description: Track expenses by family member and share access

currency.title: Choose Your Currency
currency.description: Select your primary currency for transactions
currency.label: Currency

wallets.title: Set Up Your Wallets
wallets.description: Create wallets to organize your money

categories.title: Customize Categories
categories.description: Add or modify expense and income categories

members.title: Add Family Members
members.description: Who will be using this app?

sync.title: Cloud Sync (Optional)
sync.description: Connect to Google Sheets for cloud backup and sync

currency.title: Currency Preference
currency.description: Select the primary currency symbol for your transactions.

lists.title: Lists Management
lists.description: Manage category lists separately for Income and Expenses.
lists.synced: These will be synced to your Google Sheet.

googleSheets.title: Google Sheets Integration
googleSheets.description: Sync your data with Google Sheets for backup and collaboration.
googleSheets.managedServiceDesc: Use pre-configured credentials (recommended for most users)
googleSheets.customConfigDesc: Provide your own Google API credentials

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.resetDataDesc: Replace all data with sample demo data. This will disconnect Google Sync.
dangerZone.clearDataDesc: Delete all transactions, goals, and budgets. This will disconnect Google Sync.

dialog.signOutMessage:
Are you sure you want to sign out?

All your data will be synced to Google Sheets and then cleared from this device. You will be redirected to the landing page.
dialog.disconnectMessage:
Are you sure you want to disconnect from Google Sheets?

Your data will remain in local storage, but live sync will stop until you reconnect.
dialog.configLinkCopied:
Configuration link copied to clipboard!

Send this link to family members. When they open it, the app will automatically configure the data source.
dialog.fillConfigFields: Please fill in and save the configuration fields first.
dialog.enterSpreadsheetId: Please enter your Spreadsheet ID first.
dialog.managedServiceImportedMsg:
Spreadsheet ID imported successfully!

This configuration uses Managed Service credentials. Make sure your environment variables (VITE_GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID and VITE_GOOGLE_API_KEY) are set.

Click "Save & Connect" to apply.
dialog.importSuccessfulMsg:
Configuration imported successfully!

Click 'Save & Connect' to apply.
dialog.credentialsImported:
Credentials imported!

Please enter your Spreadsheet ID manually, then click 'Save & Connect'.
dialog.importFailedMsg: Failed to parse configuration file. Please provide a valid JSON config or .env file.
dialog.missingCredentials: Configuration is missing required credentials (Client ID or API Key).

feedback.title: Feedback / Issues
feedback.description: We'd love to hear from you! Report bugs, request features, or share your thoughts.

errors.connectionFailed: Connection failed. Please check your internet connection.
errors.permissionDenied: Permission denied. Please check your access rights.
errors.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.

ai.title: AI Assistant
ai.welcome: Hi! I'm your AI financial assistant. Ask me anything about your finances!

errors.noApiKey: Please configure an AI provider in Settings
errors.apiError: Failed to connect to AI provider. Please check your API key.
